segments.text: Do you remember what the ratings of movies stand for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , G stands for General Audiences , PG means Parental Guidance suggested , R is restricted to audiences under 18 and X means explicit content .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does anyone pay any attention to those ratings anymore ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remember when we were kids ? Theaters wouldn't let kids in to PG moves without a parent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I remember that I never saw an X moves even displayed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now with video rentals it's all a personal matter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yea , I never see theaters turn people away for their age anymore either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now we have to make a choice about what we will see and what we won't .
segments.speaker: S2
